Graphics

PICKI’s graphics are designed to bring a sense of friendliness and playful vibes with the bold colours, rounded shapes, and minimalist elements. We balance fun and functionality through cute mascots, thick-lined icons, and soft-edged buttons and cards. The overall design creates an engaging and intuitive user experience.

Meet Our Mascots

The PICKI friend group consists of all of the PICKI mascots. Each little guy brings a different vibe to the scene— just like your friend groups in real life! They’re designed with the bright theme colours, a cute roundness and silly faces to brighten up the app.

Icons

The icons are all drawn with love in a simple and fun style. The rounded edges and thicker lines bring a sense of playfulness while also maintaining a recognizable appearance for all users. They also appear in white (#FFFFF) for visibility in dark mode.

Buttons

PICKI’s buttons are designed in a modern, minimalistic style with the rounded edges that feels both fun and intuitive. The dark neutrals with the bright theme colours align with PICKI’s playful aesthetic while ensuring usability and user engagement. Black buttons also appear in white (#FFFFF) for visibility in dark mode.

Cards

The cards help users visually organize all the elements of the PICKI app. They were designed to make information accessible and clear with the vibrant theme colours, rounded edges and bold typography. Each card serves a distinct purpose while maintaining consistency in style.
